title: i need help
body: i deleted my old gmail and i cant change or add new one cz of that. can riot can help me to add my new gmail?

replies.body: No worries, we're glad to help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can help update your information!  We'll respond as soon as we can!
